event: After he arrived in France to play for Paris Saint Germain in 2012
quote: It’s true I don’t know much about the players here, but they definitely know who I am.

event: Speaking to a reporter about who would qualify for the 2014 World Cup
quote:
Zlatan: “Only God knows who will go through.”
Reporter: “It’s hard to ask him.”
Zlatan: “You’re talking to him.”
I can’t help but laugh at how perfect I am.
I do not need a trophy to tell myself that I am the best.

event: When a reporter asked what he got his wife for her birthday
When Arsene Wenger asked him to have a trial with Arsenal when he was 17
quote: I turned it down. Zlatan doesn't do auditions.

event: When Sweden were beaten by Portugal and didn't qualify for World Cup 2014
quote: One thing is for sure, a World Cup without me is nothing to watch.

event: After Sweden were eliminated from Euro 2012
quote: I don't give a shit who wins, I'm going on holiday.
An injured Zlatan is a pretty serious thing for any team.

event: When Zlatan is looking for an apartment in Paris
quote: We are looking for an apartment. If we don't find anything, then I'll probably just buy the hotel.

event: On how Pep played him in Barcelona
quote: You bought a Ferrari and drive it like a Fiat.

event: On Eric Cantona's comment that Zlatan would be the king of Manchester
quote: I won't be the king of Manchester, I will be the God of Manchester.
I came like a king, left like a legend.

event: On rumours that he bought a Porsche
quote: Absolutely not. I have ordered a plane. It is much faster.
I can play in all of the 11 positions because a good player can play anywhere.

I need new haters.
The old ones became my fans.

Pressure is like medicine.
Take it to get better.

I think I'm like wine.
The older I get, the better I get.
I could play at the same level until I'm 50 years old.
